message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our exclusive product to you. Given its high value and rarity, we believe it is worth $1200000. We understand the significance of this opportunity for you, and we aim to facilitate a fair transaction. Let's discuss how we can reach an agreement that benefits both parties.
I appreciate your product and its value, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1000000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to be mindful of my budget.

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. While we understand your budget constraints, we would like to respectfully suggest a compromise. Considering the unique value and quality of the product, we propose a price of $1100000. This offer reflects a middle ground between our initial asking price and your counteroffer. We hope this proposal will be acceptable and look forward to your response.

I appreciate Alice's willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $1050000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and my budget constraints.
